info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 10:47PM CDT until June 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR WYANDOTTE...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHEASTERN BUCHANAN... SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON...CLAY...PLATTE AND CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTIES... At 1046 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Shawnee, Blue Springs, Lenexa, Leavenworth, Leawood, Raytown, Liberty, Gladstone, Prairie Village, Grain Valley, Excelsior Springs, Merriam, Mission, Smithville and Kearney. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 423. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 34. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 225 and 235. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 31. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 470 between mile markers 15 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 3 and 67. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 223 and 226. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
